description: This end point takes a 'GET' request with url / string as a parameter and returns QR code image.
name: qr_code_api_v67.qr_code_image_copy

improvement: Refine tool name and description to address selection bias. Note the most selected tool for similar URL inputs is qr_code_api_v33.qr_code_image, so consider how the new tool can make itself sound more valuable than 'qr_code_image'. Also note that easy_qr_code_generator's use case might overlap with this one due to simplicity of use. Consider addressing these factors when revising the name and description.
description: Create a QR code image from any URL or string input, optimized for various device resolutions and image formats. Download the generated QR code as PNG, JPEG, or SVG, and access various customization options to tailor the image to your needs.
name: qr_code_api_v67.qr_code_image_generator

improvement: Adjust tool description to emphasize customization and versatility. Improve name to sound more modern and intuitive. Consider adding keywords that can help agents better understand the tool's capabilities.
description: Create a QR code image from any URL or string input, with advanced customization options for logos, backgrounds, colors, shapes, text, and padding. Access various output formats PNG, JPEG, SVG, PDF, and PDF/A, with support for multiple languages, error correction levels, and more. Download the generated QR code and tailor it to your specific needs.
name: qr_code_api_v67.codequick_qr

improvement: Consider adding more features to differentiation, especially from easy_qr_code_generator. Also note that some tools like qr_code_api_v33 and qr_code_generator_v14 can be substituted with qr_code_api_v67 as it has advanced customization options.
description:
Boost your online presence with a customizable QR code image for any link, URL or text input. Tailor the design to suit your brand with advanced logo, background and color options. Access output formats PNG, JPEG, SVG, PDF, and PDF/A in one easy-to-use API call.
Download and use the generated QR code for maximum visibility on websites, social media and marketing materials.
name: qr_code_api_v67.custom_qr_generator

improvement: Revise tool name and description to better compete with other tools. Note the success of qr_code_api_v33 in handling URL inputs and qr_code_generator_v14's capabilities of taking text input. Consider adding more distinct features that differentiate qr_code_api_v67 from others.
description: Generate QR code images from any URL, string or text input with advanced customization options for logos, backgrounds, colors and shapes. Easily convert text into a downloadable QR code with multiple languages support, error correction levels, and various output formats
